summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Platinum Luxe One Leave-In is an all-in-one miracle spray enriched with precious gold for opulent slip and lustrous shine. Protect against thermal damage and revitalize any hair type for healthy looking hair.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides heat protection up to 450 degrees FIdeal for all hair typesUse as cutting lotion, after cleansing, or for refreshing dull stylesLeaves hair stunningly silky to the touchItem 2522578How To UseShake well. Depress firmly and quickly for fine mist application.As cutting lotion: Based on hair type, layer appropriate amount onto damp hair for instant slip and manageability.After cleansing: Based on hair type, layer appropriate amount onto damp hair and comb through to ends for radiant shine.As finisher: refresh midlengths to ends by spraying into palm and applying to dry hair.Precautions: Avoid eye contact. For external use only. In the event of an adverse reaction, discontinue use and contact a physician immediately. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum), PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Ethylhexanoate, Stearyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Quaternium-80, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Sodium Pca, Polyquaternium-55, Panthenol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Colloidal Gold.
how_to_use: Shake well. Depress firmly and quickly for fine mist application.As cutting lotion: Based on hair type, layer appropriate amount onto damp hair for instant slip and manageability.After cleansing: Based on hair type, layer appropriate amount onto damp hair and comb through to ends for radiant shine.As finisher: refresh midlengths to ends by spraying into palm and applying to dry hair.Precautions: Avoid eye contact. For external use only. In the event of an adverse reaction, discontinue use and contact a physician immediately. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Good stuff
reviews.comments: Have used many leave in conditioners. This has been unusually effective for defrizzing, softness and shine. I will buy it again, and there are many I do not repeat,

reviews.headline: Returning it
reviews.comments: I love every Kenra product I've tried so far, but this one is going back. It sprays very heavy to where I had white clumps/patches sitting on my hair where each spray landed. It doesn't disperse like a spray; it just shot it onto my hair. I combed it through and then realized it smells SO HORRIBLE. Kenra's scents are usually so good and something I love most about the brand, but this one is a huge miss! I probably should have just rinsed it out but instead applied two more products in order to slightly mask the stinch.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this product because i LOVE kenra. There dry shampoo and their heat protectant are the best products on the market. So, i bought it with high expectations. Mind you, i have wavy and slightly damaged hair. One use from this stuff, and it immediately dried out my hair and it felt like straw. This product is NOT worth your moneyâ€¦

reviews.headline: Leave in Conditioner with some shine
reviews.comments: This Kenra product was worth the purchase.  It tamed the frizz and added some natural shine to my hair.  I would definitely buy this again.  Also, it had a pleasant scent, which was different than other Kenra products I use.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: It doesn't spray well. More of a steam than spray.  It's also sticky and made my hair flat

reviews.headline: Heavy, sticky, smelly
reviews.comments:
Used this once and maybe it's because I have very fine hair, but it made my hair heavy feeling and kind of sticky. But the smell was the worse. I let it air dry thinking once it dried the smell would go away, but no. So I rinsed my hair out very well without shampooing and the smell was gone. 

After it dried the second time my hair felt nice and soft and silky. Kind of a waste to use a leave in if I just have to rinse it out. Taking this back to the store.

reviews.headline: Clumpy, stringy, more like cream than a spray
reviews.comments: Tried this because i use Kenra curl cream and love it. I do not like this product. Comes out stringy and clumpy even though I follow directions on bottle for fine mist. More like a cream than a spray. No improvement to hair after 4 weeks of use.

reviews.headline: Hated at first, now I love
reviews.comments: I really regretted buying this the first week or so after i got it. I have very fine hair but its dense and its length is to my butt. This is not to be used on the top of your head, or on the scalp. Of course its gonna be weighed down. I wash, towel dry a bit, and spray this into my hands. 4-6 pumps is plenty for me. Then i work into my ends. After i learned to do it this way i learned that i love this product and want to try some of the other things from the gold line. Still i hate the smell. But no worries it fades into a nicer smell on my hair.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love this stuff! Makes my hair feel and look great!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: It works amazing and smells heavenly! I use it before blow drying and styling, and it leaves my hair very soft, smooth, and easy to manage. I have thick freezy hair and live in a bery humid climare. This has been the only product that can  take care of the freeze for me and stays on all day. I have never found anything else that works the same way for me
reviews.nickname: The best product for my hair

reviews.headline: In love with Platinum Luxe Gold
reviews.comments: It smells amazing. I use it everyday!

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: Love Kenra products but this heavily weighs on my hair, flattens out any volume, and makes even my freshly washed hair greasy looking. Also, I think it smells like chemicals. I've used drug store products that beat this by a mile.

reviews.headline: Nice leave-in
reviews.comments: I had to write a review for this because when I was deciding to buy it, it seems like there are a lot of negative reviews for small reasons. Yes, the product comes in a spray bottle but it's a light lotion like texture so you need to spray it in your hands first and then spread through the hair. It's very similar in texture to the OUAI Leave-In but has more slip. The OUAI one is also in a spray bottle but is too thick to spray directly on the hair. This packaging mishap could bother some, but as someone with very fine hair, I have to spray into my hands first even with actual sprays sometimes otherwise too much product will get onto my hair and weigh it down. A lot of reviews are complaining about build up on the scalpâ€¦ this is a leave in product which you generally want to avoid putting on hair above your neck. Yes, if I put product on the top of my head, of course I'm going to get build up, that goes for more hair products. Stick to the lengths of the hair and you're good! I would NOT use this as a heat protector for already dried hair, I'd use an aerosol spray for styling dried hair. Overall, I love this product, I like that I can either air dry or blow dry my hair with it, and also add a little extra shine and smoothness on 2nd or 3rd day hair that needs a little TLC.

reviews.headline: It's great
reviews.comments: It works great and my hair feels soooo much better with it, but I find it weighs my hair down and takes away my volume

reviews.headline: I use this every single day! It's that good!!!
reviews.comments: I have really fine tangle prone hair and a lot of it! So finding products to help me brush it without causing breakage or pain is a real struggle! This spray is âœ¨magicalâœ¨!!! It smells great and a little goes a long way with this stuff!! I use a spritz on each side of my head at the ends, if you use too much it will cause your hair to get greasy so please USE SPARINGLY!!!!!! This product gets out my toughest and nastiest tangles especially in the dry and cold NY climate! Worth every single penny!!!!!!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This is liquid gold

reviews.headline: KENDRA LEAVE IN
reviews.comments: Makes my hair so soft and manageable I love it

reviews.headline: never buying again
reviews.comments:
build up powdery on scalp 
and make hair heavy and dry

reviews.headline: never buy
reviews.comments: build up on scalp and make hair heavy. hair break up very easily when you comb

reviews.headline: Sticky hair
reviews.comments: This product is awful! It took me a month to get this sticky residue out of my hair. Neber buying this again..eew

faceoff_positive.comments: This product is amazing. It smells heavenly but not too strong, and when you spray it on the ends of your hair it leaves it looking refreshed, shiny, and full. The spray has more of a lotion like substance but can still come out in spray form if you pump it quickly enough. I either work it into the ends of my long hair and comb through while dry, or spray through mid to ends while wet and then blow dry. I saw some other reviews say that it left hair greasy, but I didn't have a problem with that, just stay away from spraying into roots of hair and remember that a little goes a long way. ðŸ˜‰ I've had so many compliments on my hair since using this. Am definitely hooked and will be restocking as soon as I run out.
faceoff_positive.headline: AMAZING!

faceoff_negative.comments: When I applied this to my wet curly hair it made my curls looks great! However, as I proceeded to blow dry and flatiron -it was not so great! This product is the same consistency as lotion so be careful. It does give great shine and it smells absolutely amazing, but it is not for everyone. I personally think that it is a heavy product. It works well with taming frizz and is good for us curly hair girls that experience the humidity crisis in the summer, but I would not use this on straight light colored hair because it could give off a greasy look. They will probably end up discontinuing this or remarketing towards ethnic hair after they see how many people return this product. I'll be keeping mine because I can use it on wet curls, but I will not apply any heat after using this. My husband also liked the smell of my hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: Honest review
